title: Budai Xiao Heshang
synopsis: "The Little Budai Monk" takes the Budai monk incarnation of the Maitreya Buddha as the prototype, and uses the reconstruction of the temple as a starting point. It tells the strange and ridiculous things that the Little Budai monk encountered in the process of rebuilding the temple. Together with his friends, Use wisdom to help people overcome difficulties and warm the world with love. The plot is relaxed, interesting and touching. The traditional Chinese virtues are incorporated into it, which combines education and entertainment, teaches children to be kind, do good, and speak well, and spread positive energy. (translted fromo iqiyi)
